channel.title: Item.cfg error
channel.description:
Hello, I'm getting an error upon the running of my server. I get nothing about this when I am compiling the server, Its only when I run it and it loads item.cfg. Weird error, never happened on Windows. I gave up on Windows though because it fails and moved to Linux so that may help. I'm trying to get it running in Linux.
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]

item.title: Item.cfg error
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

No fix. I haven’t modified anything in the file lately. Its been a while since I’ve messed with this server. There were spaces in 3 of the lines, Which I changed to tabs. And now I get the same error, Except the out of bounds exception now says 17 instead of 16. And ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 10:09:35 pm[/size][hr]Thanks for your attempts guys! If I could Id give you some rep =/ I figured it out though!

Thanks Again

Read full topic

DONT SPACE,try tabing =)

If you can’t fix by tomorrow I’ll help.

item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

No Problem Let me see what I can find. My assumption by the error returned was some line has an extra character or something but I’m not sure. Let me to scan over it and ill reply if it doesn’t work. Thank you!
